title: Trip.com, Regencell Bioscience, And Atlassian Are Among Top 10 Large Cap Losers Last Week (Jan. 12-Jan. 16): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
text: Regencell led last week's large-cap losers as Figma, Atlassian and Trip.com slid on downgrades, probes and broader tech weakness.

title: Sandisk, Bloom Energy, And Oklo Are Among the Top 10 Large-Cap Gainers Last Week (Jan. 5-Jan. 9): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
text: Defense, AI power demand and deal-driven catalysts powered last week's top large-cap winners, led by sharp surges in RGC, RVMD and a cluster of defense and data-center energy plays.

title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Continues Investigations into Regencell and Camping World on Behalf of Stockholders and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
text: NEW YORK, Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --  Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C., a nationally recognized shareholder rights law firm, is investigating potential claims against Regencell Bioscience Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:RGC) and Camping World Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:CWH). Our investigations concern whether these companies have violated the federal securities laws and/or engaged in other unlawful business practices. Additional information about each case can be found at the link provided.

title: Palantir, Tesla, And Applovin Are Among Top 10 Large Cap Losers Last Week (Dec. 29-Jan. 2): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
text: Last week's large-cap laggards were led by Regencell, AppLovin, and Palantir after big prior runs, while Tesla slipped on Q4 deliveries missing estimates amid Europe pressure, with additional downside across SailPoint, Carvana, Guidewire, QXO, Harmony Gold, and Medline.

title: Regencell Bioscience (NASDAQ:RGC) Shares Gap Up   – Here’s What Happened
text: Regencell Bioscience Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: RGC - Get Free Report)'s stock price gapped up before the market opened on Friday. The stock had previously closed at $21.00, but opened at $22.04. Regencell Bioscience shares last traded at $22.12, with a volume of 25,705 shares.
